sections.heading: domain; power of district to exercise
sections.text: Every school district shall have power to exercise the right of eminent domain. The procedure to condemn property shall be exercised in the manner set forth in sections 76-704 to 76-724.SourceLaws 1921, c. 51, ยง 1, p. 222;C.S.1922, ยง 6486;C.S.1929, ยง 79-1701;R.S
